node.name: Privacy Policy
node.content: {"_uid":"42dde7c3-92a4-446f-9205-6043f49c5f93","body":[{"_uid":"b4ca83ca-1a26-4683-aa45-3fe3accefc4d","title":"PRIVACY POLICY ","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"Date:","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"text":" ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"March 2021","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"PRIVACY NOTICE FOR EMPLOYEES, VOLUNTEERS AND USERS","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"PURPOSE","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"ANDYSMANCLUB LTD. is committed to protecting the privacy and security of your personal information.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"This privacy notice describes how we collect and use personal information about you during and after your working relationship with us, in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"ANDYSMANCLUB LTD. is a “data controller”. This means that we are responsible for deciding how we hold and use personal information about you. We are required under data protection legislation to notify you of the information contained in this privacy notice.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"This notice applies to current and former employees, volunteers and users. This notice does not form part of any contract of employment or other contract to provide services. We may update this notice at any time but if we do so, we will provide you with an updated copy of this notice as soon as reasonably practical.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"It is important that you read and retain this notice, together with any other privacy notice we may provide on specific occasions when we are collecting or processing personal information about you, so that you are aware of how and why we are using such information and what your rights are under the data protection legislation.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"SCOPE","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"It applies to all employees, volunteers and users.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"DETAILS OF THE PRIVACY NOTICE","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":5},"content":[{"text":"1. DATA PROTECTION PRINCIPLES","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We will comply with data protection law. This says that the personal information we hold about you must be:","type":"text"}]},{"type":"ordered_list","attrs":{"order":1},"content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Used lawfully, fairly and in a transparent way.","type":"text"}]}]},{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":" Collected only for valid purposes that we have clearly explained to you and not used in any way that is incompatible with those purposes.","type":"text"}]}]},{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Relevant to the purposes we have told you about and limited only to those purposes.","type":"text"}]}]},{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Accurate and kept up to date","type":"text"}]}]},{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Kept only as long as necessary for the purposes we have told you about.","type":"text"}]}]},{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Kept securely.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"2. THE KIND OF INFORMATION WE HOLD ABOUT YOU","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Personal data, or personal information, means any information about an individual from which that person can be identified. It does not include data where the identity has been removed (anonymous data).","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"There are “special categories” of more sensitive personal data which require a higher level of protection, such as information about a person’s health or sexual orientation.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":5},"content":[{"text":"3.2.1","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"text":" ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"EMPLOYEES","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We may collect, store, and use the following categories of personal information about you, as an employee of ANDYSMANCLUB LTD.:","type":"text"}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Personal contact details such as name, title, addresses, telephone numbers, and personal email addresses.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Date of birth.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Gender.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Passport details","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Marital status and dependants.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Next of kin and emergency contact information.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"National Insurance number.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Bank account details, payroll records and tax status information.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Salary, annual leave, pension and benefits information.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Start date and, if different, the date of your continuous employment.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Leaving date and your reason for leaving.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Location of employment or workplace.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Copy of driving licence (but not driving history data) (if use AMC vehicles).","type":"text"}]}]},{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Recruitment information (including copies of right to work documentation, references and other information included in your application form).","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Employment records (including job titles, work history, working hours, holidays, training records and professional memberships).","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Compensation history.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Performance information.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Disciplinary and grievance information.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"CCTV footage and other information obtained through electronic means such as swipe card records.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Information about your use of our information and communications systems.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Photographs.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Results of HMRC employment status check, details of your interest in and connection with the intermediary through which your services are supplied.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We may also collect, store and use the following “special categories” of more sensitive personal information:","type":"text"}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Information about your race or ethnicity, religious beliefs and relationship status","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Trade union membership.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Information about your health, including any medical condition, health and sickness records, including:","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"details of any absences (other than holidays) from work including time on statutory parental leave and sick leave; and","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"where you leave employment and the reason for leaving is related to your health, information about that condition needed for pensions and permanent health insurance purposes.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Results of any DBS checks undertaken in the course of ascertaining your eligibility for employment with us.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"3.2.2","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"text":" ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"VOLUNTEERS AND USERS","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"At the moment the data we store for volunteers and users is the following: ","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We may collect, store, and use the following categories of personal information about you, as an volunteer of ANDYSMANCLUB LTD.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Name ","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Address","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"phone number","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"email addresses ","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We may collect, store, and use the following categories of personal information about you, as an user of ANDYSMANCLUB LTD.:","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Name ","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Email ","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Area they live (not address)","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"How is your personal information collected?","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We collect personal information about employees, volunteers and users through the application and recruitment process, either directly from candidates or sometimes from an employment agency or background check provider. We may sometimes collect additional information from third parties including former employers. We may also collect personal","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"information from the trustees or managers of pension arrangements operated by a group company.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We will collect additional personal information in the course of job-related activities throughout the period of you working for us.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Due to track and trace we ask permission on the form to keep user details for a mailing list they opt in or opt out. Data is deleted every 21 days for those who say no to keeping their email, this is noted on the track and trace form. ","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"4. HOW WE WILL USE INFORMATION ABOUT YOU","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We will only use your personal information when the law allows us to. Most commonly, we will use your personal information in the following circumstances:","type":"text"}]},{"type":"ordered_list","attrs":{"order":1},"content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Where we need to perform the contract we have entered into with you.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"ordered_list","attrs":{"order":2},"content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Where we need to comply with a legal obligation.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"ordered_list","attrs":{"order":3},"content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Where it is necessary for our legitimate interests (or those of a third party) and your interests and fundamental rights do not override those interests.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We may also use your personal information in the following situations, which are likely to be rare:","type":"text"}]},{"type":"ordered_list","attrs":{"order":1},"content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Where we need to protect your interests (or someone else’s interests).","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"ordered_list","attrs":{"order":2},"content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Where it is needed in the public interest.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"5. SITUATIONS IN WHICH WE WILL USE YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We need all the categories of information in the list above (see paragraph 3) primarily to allow us to perform our contract with you and to enable us to comply with legal obligations. In some cases we may use your personal information to pursue legitimate interests of our own or those of third parties, provided your interests and fundamental rights do not override those interests.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"The situations in which we will process your personal information are listed below.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Making a decision about your recruitment or appointment.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Determining the terms on which you work for us.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Checking you are legally entitled to work in the UK.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Paying you and, if you are an employee or deemed employee for tax purposes, deducting tax and National Insurance contributions (NICs).","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Enrolling you in a pension arrangement in accordance with our statutory automatic enrolment duties.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Liaising with the trustees or managers of a pension arrangement operated by a group company, your pension provider and any other provider of employee benefits.","type":"text"}]}]},{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Administering the contract we have entered into with you.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Business management and planning, including accounting and auditing.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Conducting performance reviews, managing performance and determining performance requirements.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Making decisions about salary reviews and compensation.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Assessing qualifications for a particular job or task, including decisions about promotions.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Gathering evidence for possible grievance or disciplinary hearings.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Making decisions about your continued employment or engagement.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Making arrangements for the termination of our working relationship.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Education, training and development requirements.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Dealing with legal disputes involving you, or other employees, workers and contractors, including accidents at work.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Ascertaining your fitness to work.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Managing sickness absence.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Complying with health and safety obligations.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"To prevent fraud.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"To monitor your use of our information and communication systems to ensure compliance with our IT policies.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"To ensure network and information security, including preventing unauthorised access to our computer and electronic communications systems and preventing malicious software distribution.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"To conduct data analytics studies to review and better understand employee retention and attrition rates.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Equal opportunities monitoring.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Some of the above grounds for processing will overlap and there may be several grounds which justify our use of your personal information.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"6. IF YOU FAIL TO PROVIDE PERSONAL INFORMATION","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"If you fail to provide certain information when requested, we may not be able to perform the contract we have entered into with you (such as paying you or providing a benefit), or we","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"may be prevented from complying with our legal obligations (such as to ensure the health and safety of our workers).","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"7. CHANGE OF PURPOSE","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We will only use your personal information for the purposes for which we collected it, unless we reasonably consider that we need to use it for another reason and that reason is compatible with the original purpose. If we need to use your personal information for an unrelated purpose, we will notify you and we will explain the legal basis which allows us to do so.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Please note that we may process your personal information without your knowledge or consent, in compliance with the above rules, where this is required or permitted by law.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"8. HOW WE USE PARTICULARLY SENSITIVE PERSONAL INFORMATION","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"“Special categories” of particularly sensitive personal information require higher levels of protection. We need to have further justification for collecting, storing and using this type of personal information. We have in place an appropriate policy document and safeguards which we are required by law to maintain when processing such data. We may process special categories of personal information in the following circumstances:","type":"text"}]},{"type":"ordered_list","attrs":{"order":1},"content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"In limited circumstances, with your explicit written consent.","type":"text"}]}]},{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Where we need to carry out our legal obligations or exercise rights in connection with employment.","type":"text"}]}]},{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Where it is needed in the public interest, such as for equal opportunities monitoring or in relation to our occupational pension scheme.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Less commonly, we may process this type of information where it is needed in relation to legal claims or where it is needed to protect your interests (or someone else’s interests) and you are not capable of giving your consent, or where you have already made the information public. We may also process such information about members or former members in the course of legitimate business activities with the appropriate safeguards.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"9. OUR OBLIGATIONS AS AN EMPLOYER","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We will use your particularly sensitive personal information in the following ways:","type":"text"}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We will use information relating to leaves of absence, which may include sickness absence or family related leaves, to comply with employment and other laws.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We will use information about your physical or mental health, or disability status, to ensure your health and safety in the workplace and to assess your fitness to work, to provide appropriate workplace adjustments, to monitor and manage sickness absence and to administer benefits including statutory maternity pay, statutory sick pay, pensions and permanent health insurance.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"If you apply for an ill-health pension under a pension arrangement operated by a group company, we will use information about your physical or mental health in reaching a decision about your entitlement.","type":"text"}]}]},{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We will use information about your race or national or ethnic origin, religious, philosophical or moral beliefs, or your sexual life or sexual orientation, to ensure meaningful equal opportunity monitoring and reporting.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We will use trade union membership information to pay trade union premiums, register the status of a protected employee and to comply with employment law obligations.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"10. DO WE NEED YOUR CONSENT?","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We do not need your consent if we use special categories of your personal information in accordance with our written policy to carry out our legal obligations or exercise specific rights in the field of employment law. In limited circumstances, we may approach you for your written consent to allow us to process certain particularly sensitive data. If we do so, we will provide you with full details of the information that we would like and the reason we need it, so that you can carefully consider whether you wish to consent. You should be aware that it is not a condition of your contract with us that you agree to any request for consent from us.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"11. INFORMATION ABOUT CRIMINAL CONVICTIONS","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We may only use information relating to criminal convictions where the law allows us to do so. This will usually be where such processing is necessary to carry out our obligations and provided we do so in line with our data protection policy.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Less commonly, we may use information relating to criminal convictions where it is necessary in relation to legal claims, where it is necessary to protect your interests (or someone else’s interests) and you are not capable of giving your consent, or where you have already made the information public.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We may also process such information about members or former members in the course of legitimate business activities with the appropriate safeguards.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We envisage that we will hold information about criminal convictions. However, such information will likely be limited to the following:","type":"text"}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Information we receive as a result of completing a DBS search or barring check. Although this will be limited to reference that you have previous convictions (but not what those previous convictions are).","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Any information that we receive from third parties such as the court services or police about any involvement in a criminal act which we need to talk to you about.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We will only collect information about criminal convictions if it is appropriate given the nature of the role and where we are legally able to do so. Where appropriate, we will collect information about criminal convictions as part of the recruitment process or we may be notified of such information directly by you in the course of you working for us.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We are allowed to use your personal information in this way to carry out our obligations in relation to safeguarding. We have in place an appropriate policy and safeguards which we are required by law to maintain when processing such data.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"12. AUTOMATED DECISION-MAKING","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Automated decision-making takes place when an electronic system uses personal information to make a decision without human intervention. We are allowed to use automated decision-making in the following circumstances:","type":"text"}]},{"type":"ordered_list","attrs":{"order":1},"content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Where we have notified you of the decision and given you 21 days to request a reconsideration.","type":"text"}]}]},{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Where it is necessary to perform the contract with you and appropriate measures are in place to safeguard your rights.","type":"text"}]}]},{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"In limited circumstances, with your explicit written consent and where appropriate measures are in place to safeguard your rights.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"If we make an automated decision on the basis of any particularly sensitive personal information, we must have either your explicit written consent or it must be justified in the public interest, and we must also put in place appropriate measures to safeguard your rights.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"You will not be subject to decisions that will have a significant impact on you based solely on automated decision-making, unless we have a lawful basis for doing so and we have notified you.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We do not envisage that any decisions will be taken about you using automated means, however we will notify you in writing if this position changes.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"13. DATA SHARING","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We may have to share your data with third parties, including third-party service providers and other entities in the group.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We require third parties to respect the security of your data and to treat it in accordance with the law.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"Why might you share my personal information with third parties?","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We will share your personal information with third parties where required by law, where it is necessary to administer the working relationship with you or where we have another legitimate interest in doing so.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"Which third-party service providers process my personal information?","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"“Third parties” includes third-party service providers (including contractors and designated agents) and other entities within our group. The following activities are carried out by third- party service providers: payroll, pension administration, benefits provision and administration and IT services.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"How secure is my information with third-party service providers and other entities in our group?","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"All our third-party service providers and other entities in the group are required to take appropriate security measures to protect your personal information in line with our policies. We do not allow our third-party service providers to use your personal data for their own purposes. We only permit them to process your personal data for specified purposes and in accordance with our instructions.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"What about other third parties?","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We may share your personal information with other third parties, for example in the context of the possible merger of the charity, or wind up. In this situation we will, so far as possible, share anonymised data with the other parties before the transaction completes. Once the transaction is completed, we will share your personal data with the other parties if and to the extent required under the terms of the transaction.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We may also need to share your personal information with a regulator or to otherwise comply with the law. This may include making returns to HMRC.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"14. DATA SECURITY","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We have put in place measures to protect the security of your information. Details of these measures are available upon request.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Third parties will only process your personal information on our instructions and where they have agreed to treat the information confidentially and to keep it secure.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We have put in place appropriate security measures to prevent your personal information from being accidentally lost, used or accessed in an unauthorised way, altered or disclosed. In addition, we limit access to your personal information to those employees, agents, contractors and other third parties who have a business need to know. They will only process your personal information on our instructions and they are subject to a duty of confidentiality.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We have put in place procedures to deal with any suspected data security breach and will notify you and any applicable regulator of a suspected breach where we are legally required to do so.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"15. DATA RETENTION","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"How long will you use my information for?","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We will only retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfil the purposes we collected it for, including for the purposes of satisfying any legal, accounting, or reporting requirements. Details of retention periods for different aspects of your personal information are available in our Data Protection policy which is available on the Andy’s Man Club intranet site. To determine the appropriate retention period for personal data, we consider the amount, nature, and sensitivity of the personal data, the potential risk of harm from unauthorised use or disclosure of your personal data, the purposes for which we process your personal data and whether we can achieve those purposes through other means, and the applicable legal requirements.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"In some circumstances we may anonymise your personal information so that it can no longer be associated with you, in which case we may use such information without further notice to you. Once you are no longer an employee, worker or contractor of the company we will retain and securely destroy your personal information in accordance with our data retention policy and or applicable laws and regulations.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"16. RIGHTS OF ACCESS, CORRECTION, ERASURE, AND RESTRICTION","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"Your duty to inform us of changes","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"It is important that the personal information we hold about you is accurate and current. Please keep us informed if your personal information changes during your working relationship with us.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"Your rights in connection with personal information","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Under certain circumstances, by law you have the right to:","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Request access","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"text":" ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"to your personal information (commonly known as a “data subject access request”). This enables you to receive a copy of the personal information we hold about you and to check that we are lawfully processing it.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Request correction","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"text":" ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"of the personal information that we hold about you. This enables you to have any incomplete or inaccurate information we hold about you corrected.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Request erasure","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"text":" ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"of your personal information. This enables you to ask us to delete or remove personal information where there is no good reason for us continuing to process it. You also have the right to ask us to delete or remove your personal information where you have exercised your right to object to processing (see below).","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Object to processing","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"text":" ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"of your personal information where we are relying on a legitimate interest (or those of a third party) and there is something about your particular situation which makes you want to object to processing on this ground. You also have the right to object where we are processing your personal information for direct marketing purposes.","type":"text"}]}]},{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Request the restriction of processing","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"text":" ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"of your personal information. This enables you to ask us to suspend the processing of personal information about you, for example if you want us to establish its accuracy or the reason for processing it.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"bullet_list","content":[{"type":"list_item","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Request the transfer","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"text":" ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"of your personal information to another party.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"If you want to review, verify, correct or request erasure of your personal information, object to the processing of your personal data, or request that we transfer a copy of your personal information to another party, please contact the office general manager, in writing.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"No fee usually required","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"You will not have to pay a fee to access your personal information (or to exercise any of the other rights). However, we may charge a reasonable fee if your request for access is clearly unfounded or excessive. Alternatively, we may refuse to comply with the request in such circumstances.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"What we may need from you","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We may need to request specific information from you to help us confirm your identity and ensure your right to access the information (or to exercise any of your other rights). This is another appropriate security measure to ensure that personal information is not disclosed to any person who has no right to receive it.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"Right to withdraw consent","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"In the limited circumstances where you may have provided your consent to the collection, processing and transfer of your personal information for a specific purpose, you have the right to withdraw your consent for that specific processing at any time. To withdraw your consent, please contact the General Manager of the office team (","type":"text"},{"text":"info@andysmanclub.co.uk","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"mailto:info@andysmanclub.co.uk","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":null,"linktype":null}}]},{"text":"). Once we have received notification that you have withdrawn your consent, we will no longer process your information for the purpose or purposes you originally agreed to, unless we have another legitimate basis for doing so in law.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"17. DATA PROTECTION OFFICER","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"If you have any questions about this privacy notice or how we handle your personal information, please contact the office general manager. You have the right to make a complaint at any time to the Information Commissioner’s Office (ICO), the UK supervisory authority for data protection issues.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"18. CHANGES TO OUR PRIVACY NOTICE","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We reserve the right to update this privacy notice at any time, and we will provide you with a new privacy notice when we make any substantial updates. We may also notify you in other ways from time to time about the processing of your personal information.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"MONITORING","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"This policy will be reviewed in line with any legislative changes to the General Data Protection Regulations.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"RELATED POLICIES/PROCEDURES/DOCUMENTS","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Please also refer to the General Data Protection Regulations Policy for further information","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"POLICY REVIEW","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Review Period: ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"text":"March 2021 - The board of trustees","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"EQUALITY IMPACT ASSESSMENT","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"First Assessment Conducted by Date: ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"text":"March 2021 - Office General Manager","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"PUBLICATION","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Published by: ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"text":"Staff","type":"text"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"Registered Address: ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"text":"Croft Myl, Halifax, HX1 2EQ","type":"text"}]}]},"component":"centered","background_color":"bg-white"}],"meta":{"_uid":"0f6ed096-8877-4229-bf5e-96eca594ef90","title":"Privacy Policy | Andy's Man Club","plugin":"seo_metatags","og_image":"","og_title":"","description":"This privacy notice describes how we collect and use personal information about you during and after your working relationship with us, in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).","twitter_image":"","twitter_title":"","og_description":"","twitter_description":""},"component":"page"}

node.name: Paul Waterworth
node.content: {"_uid":"45b58fe0-a503-425f-a805-ffdc16b0fd65","image":{"id":4637054,"alt":"","name":"","focus":null,"title":"","filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/500x700/88b40812cf/team-images-b-w-paul.jpg","copyright":"","fieldtype":"asset"},"position":"TRUSTEE","component":"trustee","description":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Hi, I’m Paul, I joined AMC in 2016, just to support my friend in getting through the door. From that first visit, I joined them on a social event, which then became an ambassador role and then a regular facilitator. I have moved forward in my life and done many things I would not have done without the support and encouragement of AMC, and I am proud to be a trustee and do my part towards building the future of the charity, and offer that same support and encouragement to every person that walks through our door.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]}}

node.name: Robert Taylor
node.content: {"_uid":"19a9f98c-691c-43e9-9d9f-8653f1e1318e","image":{"id":4636997,"alt":"","name":"","focus":null,"title":"","filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/500x700/d07ff16d79/team-images-b-w-robert.jpg","copyright":"","fieldtype":"asset"},"position":"TRUSTEE","component":"trustee","description":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Hi, I am Robert Taylor and I am now retired through ill health. After losing a family member to suicide, I began to attend a group to see how I could help prevent others from going through what my family had. I actually found the club began to help me more than I ever knew. I became so passionate about helping others and was honoured when I was asked to be a trustee to be able to give something back to such an amazing cause.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]}}

node.name: Leon McQuade
node.content: {"_uid":"546f10b3-45e5-458c-84af-6b439889b521","image":{"id":4636977,"alt":"","name":"","focus":null,"title":"","filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/500x700/dfeea13467/team-images-b-w-leon.jpg","copyright":"","fieldtype":"asset"},"position":"TRUSTEE","component":"trustee","description":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"I am Leon McQuade, I’m driven to help break the stigmas associated with “Mental Health”. These stigmas, weakness, burden, and embarrassment, are what stop men from speaking out. And with my work with ANDYSMANCLUB we are helping pave the way for men to know that #ITSOKAYTOTALK and to break these stigmas.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]}}

node.name: Shaun Tymon
node.content: {"_uid":"246e51d7-74a2-47fd-a112-6915c859e9dc","image":{"id":4709899,"alt":"","name":"","focus":null,"title":"","filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/500x700/99ec0051c6/team-images-b-w-shaun.jpg","copyright":"","fieldtype":"asset"},"position":"TRUSTEE","component":"trustee","description":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Hi, I’m Shaun. I became involved in AMC in 2019 when I was asked by a friend to help him set up the Scarborough branch. Having suffered from poor mental health myself and having lost a close friend to suicide I was keen to be involved in anything that might help. However until the opening night in Scarborough, on 3 February 2020, I had no idea of the real power of AMC to get men talking, to make a real difference and save lives. The trustees and staff at AMC have achieved an incredible amount since the charity was established, so I was honoured to be invited to join them in December 2020. I’m looking forward to playing a small part in helping AMC grow to reach more and more men across the UK.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]}}

WE SUPPORT ORGANISATIONS.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Since 2016, we have delivered our story and the stories of our staff, volunteers and trustees to thousands of businesses, organisations and charities. Our sessions consist of an overview of our story, the importance of talking, the story of the man delivering the session and how our services can be accessed. We can deliver to as many members of your organisation as you would like, both online and in person, as many times as you need. All sessions delivered are free of charge, our priority as always is awareness and making our sessions available to as many men as node.content: {"_uid":"c478e513-b8e2-48f1-b6df-6bf40506c0f3","body":[{"_uid":"4c1719e9-5847-4ca4-b351-ba2730521940","title":"RAISING AWARENESS.","component":"hero","hero_image":{"id":null,"alt":null,"name":"","focus":null,"title":null,"filename":"","copyright":null,"fieldtype":"asset"},"button_text":"","description":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"From leaving our business card in a shop, to climbing a mountain for ANDYSMANCLUB, there are so many ways you can make a difference and help us spread the message that #ItsOkayToTalk.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"button_target":{"id":"","url":"","linktype":"story","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":""},"background_color":"bg-black"},{"_uid":"474cc583-0d44-4a7c-a103-f2195660ceea","image":{"id":4709339,"alt":"","name":"","focus":null,"title":"","filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/555x825/a4a5158d56/support-our-charity-370x550.jpg","copyright":"","fieldtype":"asset"},"label":"SUPPORTING US","title":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"IT’S NEVER BEEN ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"A BETTER TIME TO ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"SUPPORT A CHARITY","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"LIKE US.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"With suicide rates soaring in the UK, and the bulk of those being male, its never been a better time to support a charity like ANDYSMANCLUB.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"We only exist because of the fantastic support of people like you. There’s been so much terrific work in our communities with a a core focus of encouraging men to talk about their problems and challenges, and spreading the #ITSOKAYTOTALK hashtag. ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"We want you to know we value all the time and support you give us, everything you do to raise awareness heightens our chances of getting in front of #ThatOneMan who needs us at the right time, and ultimately, saving lives.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"two-column-text-image","button_text":"","button_target":{"id":"","url":"","linktype":"story","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":""},"background_color":"bg-black","black_background":true},{"_uid":"3569a03a-85e9-49c1-b2e4-8860497dc5fd","items":["4bb2a7ea-f9e2-4439-80b7-1b729ba3589f","64f30a81-642a-4e4d-b757-ddd6462f4cd3","6bd1e6d7-76f2-4393-864c-fafb45539175","d4913e0d-737d-43fd-8c15-dc2a2a9b5ed1","a22ce652-893b-43bb-a2a2-441deef31236","b8a5c024-4713-42b9-ba62-d5a5ab1b02c4","3b376000-b121-4627-bdc0-9f0f97daf1fc","409a1ea4-bc49-43f0-a7a9-c9864f76b8cd"],"label":"WHAT OTHERS HAVE TO SAY","component":"testimonials","button_text":"See another story","background_color":"bg-white","black_background":false,"button_functionality":true},{"_uid":"d29ef3ed-331b-454a-bb48-db16e858f6df","image":{"id":4954188,"alt":"","name":"","focus":null,"title":"","filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/2000x1500/ef2fe734e7/join-the-movement-1000x750.png","copyright":"","fieldtype":"asset"},"label":"","title":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"JOIN THE MOVEMENT","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"AND HELP RAISE VITAL","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"AWARENESS.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Help raise vital funds for ANDYSMANCLUB so we can continue our mission to get men talking and challenge the stigmas around male mental health. ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"There’s lots of ways you can help support and raise awareness for us and we’ve seen an immense amount of support over the years. Incredible supporters running, walking and swimming marathons, climbing mountains, organising football matches in support of us, skydiving and hosting music events. The list goes on. ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"Whatever way you’d like to raise awareness, we’ll support you all the way. For any enquiries regarding raising awareness ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"contact us","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"/contact-us","uuid":"0dffdc40-c98c-4848-aa22-662494d0fedc","anchor":null,"target":"_self","linktype":"story"}},{"type":"bold"},{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":" today to see how we can help. ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"simple-center-branded-with-image","button_text":"CONTACT ANDYSMANCLUB HAS AFFECTED LIVES
