node.name: FAQs Sections
node.content: {"_uid":"4d4b945b-bbd7-423b-8bdf-ca15f1ea60be","body":[{"_uid":"fb292d18-e51e-4ab4-9d59-29be80b4f7a9","title":"FAQS.","component":"hero-slimline","hero_image":{"id":null,"alt":null,"name":"","focus":null,"title":null,"filename":"","copyright":null,"fieldtype":"asset"},"button_text":"","description":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Here’s a list of the most frequently asked questions. Can’t see what you’re looking for? Drop us your question by ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"contacting us","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"/contact-us","uuid":"0dffdc40-c98c-4848-aa22-662494d0fedc","anchor":null,"target":"_self","linktype":"story"}},{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":".","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"button_target":{"id":"","url":"","linktype":"story","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":""},"smaller_width":false,"background_color":"bg-black"},{"_uid":"ade8dca6-fcff-430a-b413-00a7a142338e","items":[{"_uid":"6196d9f1-93b7-4366-a19e-12cd49cd2676","title":"When do you meet?","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Every Monday at 7PM excluding UK Bank Holidays, groups run for approximately 2 hours. The door will be open from around 18.45pm, you will be met by a friendly ANDYSMANCLUB representative who will take that step in with you and show you where the brew station and biscuits are.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"faq"},{"_uid":"273380d8-4ca3-4622-9e52-331d51a49d84","title":"Do you have professionally trained volunteers?","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"No, we are peer led. Every man that helps us to facilitate our groups also attends and uses the group.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"faq"},{"_uid":"a33a8b13-0230-4371-a8c6-32825c6b508e","title":"Do you need to be suicidal or have being suicidal in the past to attend?","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"No, there is no requirement to be suicidal or to have being. There is no requirement to have a mental health condition or issue. Men attend for multiple reasons, all men are welcome.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"faq"},{"_uid":"c77d83c8-546c-4a60-8f46-25a84851b2bb","title":"How many clubs do you have and where?","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"With new clubs opening on a monthly basis, a full list of our club locations can be found ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"here","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://andysmanclub.netlify.app/find-your-nearest-group","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":"_blank","linktype":null}},{"type":"bold"},{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":".","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"faq"},{"_uid":"2232111f-4ba9-4646-b872-309b47841c88","title":"Directions to a Club?","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"You can find your nearest group ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"here","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://andysmanclub.netlify.app/find-your-nearest-group","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":"_blank","linktype":null}},{"type":"bold"},{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":", directions will be provided on this page.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"faq"},{"_uid":"6e6c304a-75c3-4981-aa53-4d6b7a427807","title":"Is it free to attend?","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Yes, there are no fees involved in attending ANDYSMANCLUB - even the cuppa is free!","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"faq"},{"_uid":"21da8285-4d91-456b-9f7b-be600870643b","title":"Do I have to register?","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"No, there is no registration or booking involved with attending an ANDYSMANCLUB session. You do not need to tell anyone you are coming and you can turn up at any of our venues a little before 7pm.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"faq"},{"_uid":"d8d5e10d-8d30-4800-98d2-5c572392a084","title":"Do you run any events?","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Events take place on a local and national level throughout the year, keep up with your local groups Facebook page for all the latest news.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"faq"},{"_uid":"ed83c582-cce2-4e02-a896-588ce535ffb4","title":"Can women attend a group?","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Our sessions are men-only. We regularly attended and host events across the UK and women and children are always welcome to be involved.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"faq"},{"_uid":"1fabb709-789b-4a53-b235-80a1c1186bbc","title":"Are you open every Monday?","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Our sessions run every Monday excluding UK Bank Holidays.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"faq"},{"_uid":"914f7915-8dff-4e67-ad2e-9ba89c813583","title":"Can I contact a club or facilitator directly?","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"All enquiries, both local and national, are handled by our office admin team. They can be contacted on ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"info@andysmanclub.co.uk","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"info@andysmanclub.co.uk","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":"_blank","linktype":"email"}},{"type":"bold"},{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"faq"},{"_uid":"3dfd79e4-d821-45c5-8274-723f2f47aba8","title":"Will anyone know I have attended?","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"The only people who will know are the people in attendance with you. Our group is confidential and what happens in the room stays in the room. The only time where this is not the case is if a group facilitator deems you to be a harm to yourself or potentially others, then, emergency services would be notified.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"faq"},{"_uid":"d6374ead-e480-4950-a770-23266b5e58d1","title":"Is there anything I can't talk about?","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We have a very small set of rules that the facilitator of the group will run through ahead of every session to ensure safety within the group and that the session flows.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"faq"},{"_uid":"54d9040a-0430-4468-89ca-317ab3a96f58","title":"Do you keep attendance records?","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"No records of individual attendance are kept at any of our groups. Online details are also deleted unless you request that your details are kept on file for marketing purposes.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"faq"},{"_uid":"be5efb2e-6057-475e-a457-0c26d0c67065","title":"Do you present to workplaces?","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Yes, you will find details of how to arrange this ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"here","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"/invite-us-to-speak","uuid":"8ef263c2-6c9c-47b0-92c3-a7f1e2cea3b1","anchor":null,"target":"_self","linktype":"story"}},{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":".","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"faq"},{"_uid":"59fd01b9-2f34-4408-b230-0fb5a6e04a65","title":"Are you a 24/7 service?","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"No, our office team works Monday-Friday from 8-4:30pm, our sessions run from 7-9pm on Monday nights. If you require someone to talk to please call the Samaritans on 116 123.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"faq"},{"_uid":"d4f3c21d-4f8e-4aec-abd7-96b1699ef5ec","title":"How old do you have to be to attend?","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Any man over the age of 18 is able to attend our session.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"faq"},{"_uid":"898660ce-6e26-4ab6-bb42-a1329d7757b6","title":"What time do I have to get there?","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We advise attendees to get to the session at 18.45 to ensure they have time to settle in and grab free refreshments. If you are running late, please inform the office team on Facebook or on ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"info@andysmanclub.co.uk","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"info@andysmanclub.co.uk","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":"_blank","linktype":"email"}},{"type":"bold"},{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":" and we can notify the guys at your group.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"faq"},{"_uid":"437a3af5-9d3c-4271-8953-7981478395c7","title":"Can I leave early?","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We would advise you to stay for the full session to reap the full benefits of the session. If for any reason you have to leave early, please inform a facilitator before doing so.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"faq"},{"_uid":"8483882b-66a1-455e-a457-840a46d2f998","title":"How can I donate to ANDYSMANCLUB?","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"You can donate to ANDYSMANCLUB by clicking ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"here","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://donate.giveasyoulive.com/donate?cid=88015","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":"_blank","linktype":"url"}},{"type":"bold"},{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":".","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We also accept donations via bank transfer and cheques for more details email ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"info@andysmanclub.co.uk","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"INFO@ANDYSMANCLUB.CO.UK","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":"_blank","linktype":"email"}},{"type":"bold"},{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":".","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"faq"},{"_uid":"ae32da3a-86c0-4105-82ad-411a11ac18a8","title":"Can you provide me with awareness raising materials?","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Yes - please email ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"info@andysmanclub.co.uk","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"info@andysmanclub.co.uk","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":"_blank","linktype":"email"}},{"type":"bold"},{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"faq"},{"_uid":"b7bdf716-2716-471c-9a68-42b1c17ad895","title":"I’m looking for urgent help.","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"If you’re in need of urgent support, please call Samaritans on 116 123 or call CALM on 0800 58 58 58","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"faq"},{"_uid":"abe9bd71-db9a-4512-8926-171840bb022a","title":"Do you accept referrals?","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Yes we do! But referrals are not necessary to attend, men can simply turn up.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"faq"},{"_uid":"d33a7206-15d2-4781-915a-baa7bdaf30c2","title":"Can I just turn up to a venue?","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Yes - but it is advised that you check the relevant Facebook group or website to ensure the group hasn’t changed venue that week.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"faq"},{"_uid":"14d83bbb-3d21-40bb-8047-ca99880363e7","title":"Are your venues wheelchair accessible?","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Most of our venues are Wheelchair Accessible - you can find out whether your local group is accessible or not by clicking ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"here","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://andysmanclub.netlify.app/find-your-nearest-group","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":"_blank","linktype":null}},{"type":"bold"},{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":".","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"faq"}],"component":"accordion","background_color":"bg-white"}],"meta":{"_uid":"8537abd9-6a93-4fee-b493-959801f71a3f","title":"Frequently Asked Questions | Andy's Man Club","plugin":"seo_metatags","og_image":"","og_title":"","description":"Here’s a list of the most frequently asked questions. Can’t see what you’re looking for? Drop us your question by contacting us.","twitter_image":"","twitter_title":"","og_description":"","twitter_description":""},"component":"page"}

node.name: ANDYSMANCLUB One-to-Ones: Gary's Story
node.content: {"_uid":"58eee91e-e036-4d8d-87ce-745345672955","body":[{"_uid":"496364b3-921a-4646-b54e-58f5f5271121","title":"","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"My journey with ANDYSMANCLUB – Gary Clarke Facilitator Peterborough AMC I first met Luke Ambler at a Prison Service Conference in early 2017 when I was the Safer Custody Manager at HMP/YOI Peterborough, this role meant I was dealing with prisoners who self-harmed and a number who sadly took their own lives, this triggered my desire and passion to make a difference. Luke then visited the prison towards the end of 2017 and the seeds were sown to start an AMC Group in Peterborough.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"The Peterborough group started on the 9th July 2018 and has gone from strength to strength over this time. During this time I had been dealing with my own personal issues most of these were connected to a chronic eye condition I have called keratoconus – deformed corneas – without specialist care and made to measure contact lenses I would be registered blind. Most of the time I manage this condition well and can function normally but occasionally it can flare up causing soreness and pain in the eyes meaning I can’t wear my lenses, when this happens I am unable to work or function normally. I had always been open and honest with my employer and up until I had a new manager start at the prison it had never been issue. My condition is covered by the Equalities Act and until the manager started all adjustments had been made at work for me to be able to continue my career in the Prison Service.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"My new manager made it very clear early on that he would not support prolonged periods of amended duties or absence, to quote “I have beaten the disability act before and I will beat it again”. From this period forward he made my life as difficult as possible and coerced my direct line manager to be part of this bullying campaign. To cut a long story short this campaign drove me to the brink of suicide after I had another flare up and period of absence from work. On my return to work in March/April 2018 the campaign intensified and despite my approaching my line manager and other managers asking for help nothing but bullying was forthcoming. This resulted in me making a mistake at work that led to my suspension and ultimate dismissal from the Prison this bringing a 29-year career to an end and my world crashing down around me.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"During this time and up to me losing my job the support offered by AMC was immense. Even though I facilitate the Peterborough group I also use it and without it I’m really not sure I would be here today to tell you this story, this is the first time I have admitted this.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"The group is non-judgemental and nothing but supporting, it gives us a safe space to talk about how we really feel and get support and advice from men who have or are going through the same issues, so when someone says “I know how you feel” they really do mean it. ANDYSMANCLUB has saved lives and will continue to save lives and I will continue to facilitate and use AMC as long as the need is there.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"Thank you,","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"AMC you saved my life","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"centered","background_color":"bg-white"},{"_uid":"4ee91b90-299f-4226-844d-79aef374b9ed","items":["eb5b3dfe-3d35-4df2-b860-01af0170a9df","fdc0fc40-7d47-444d-8a77-7f183d0b6395","e9512c4f-078a-4425-a019-dc47dd81ed8c"],"component":"three-column-cards","custom_label":"","custom_title":"","background_color":"bg-white"}],"meta":{"_uid":"5ef3fcc8-a1a4-4ae2-966c-e2c192958b8c","title":"ANDYSMANCLUB One-to-Ones: Gary's Story | ANDYSMANCLUB","plugin":"meta-fields","description":"My journey with Andy’s Man Club – Gary Clarke Facilitator Peterborough AMC I first met Luke Ambler at a Prison Service Conference in early 2017 when I was the Safer Custody Manager at HMP/YOI Peterborough, this role meant I was dealing\nwith prisoners who self-harmed and a number who sadly took their own lives, this triggered my desire and passion to make a difference. "},"component":"news_views","description":"","featured_image":{"id":4953637,"alt":null,"name":"","focus":null,"title":null,"filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/x/688d61adf9/one-to-ones-garys-story-1500x1000.svg","copyright":null,"fieldtype":"asset"}}

node.name: ANDYSMANCLUB x Britvic – Nutrition Expert Jenny Hardwick on Hydration & Mental Health!
node.content: {"_uid":"42663d39-8b76-4c31-8b4d-c0dbd23621d0","body":[{"_uid":"31441e4e-18eb-494c-9014-68cd1e558934","title":"","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"After announcing our partnership earlier this week, we spoke to Jenny Hardwick, a member of Britvic’s Nutrition Team, about the links between hydration, nutrition and positive Mental Health.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"Good Hydration for a Good Mood","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"There are increasing amounts of scientific evidence to suggest that what we put into our bodies has a real influence on our mood. A healthy and balanced diet plays a role in regulating our mood as does good hydration, so it’s not to be forgotten about! The human body is made up of around 70% water and it plays several roles from helping to keep your heart pumping to regulating body temperature, so it’s important that we keep topped up, aiming for 1.5-2L water per day.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"What are the effects of dehydration on our wellbeing?","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"When we’re dehydrated, it can take its toll on our mental wellbeing. Feelings of tiredness, dizziness and light-headedness are common, and it can impact our emotional state making us more irritable.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Concentration and memory can also be impaired and together these symptoms could leave us feeling in a poor state of wellbeing. Studies suggest that even mild dehydration can lead to increased tension and anxiety.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"How do you know if you’re dehydrated?","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Do you feel thirsty? That’s our bodies way of telling us we need to drink more! Also, check your pee, if you’re dehydrated your pee will be a dark yellow or orange colour so you need to be drinking more.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":4},"content":[{"text":"Good sources of hydration","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Water is the gold standard for hydration. Free of calories and straight out of the tap.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Tea/ coffee/ herbal tea provide hydration and some extra nutrition if you add milk. Don’t forget to be mindful of the amount of caffeine you’re having with tea/coffee.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Milk counts as fluid and is a great way to get extra calcium in your diet. Be mindful of the fat content and choose semi-skimmed or skimmed if you’re managing your weight and full fat if you’re looking to gain weight.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Sugar free soft drinks such as squash and sodas make hydration a little more interesting. Add a drop of squash to still or sparkling water to make yourself a refreshing drink. These drinks are acidic so drink in moderation.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Fruit and Vegetables also contribute to your fluid intake! Cucumber, tomatoes, mushrooms, watermelon and apples are just a few of the foods which are high in water. It’s also a great way of reaching your 5-a day. Don’t forget smoothies and juices count too but stick to a 150ml portion per day.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Keep a water bottle handy wherever you are, if it’s there you’ll drink it! Aim for 1.5 – 2 litres a day.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Eat your fruit and veg, not only is this great for overall health and wellbeing but it also helps you to keep hydrated.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Not a fan of water? Add sugar-free squash or a wedge of fruit to make it more interesting!","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Drink more if it’s hot or if you’ve been particularly active.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"blok","attrs":{"id":"a2786c24-b355-4d44-8013-59812f56c317","body":[{"_uid":"i-b6316be5-4151-4edd-a28f-cabec58ab6ba","title":"Resources / References","content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Feeding Minds, Mental Health Foundation –","type":"text"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"https://www.mentalhealth.org.uk/sites/default/files/Feeding-Minds.pdf","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.mentalhealth.org.uk/sites/default/files/Feeding-Minds.pdf","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":"_blank","linktype":"url"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"British Dietetic Association & Mind ","type":"text"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"https://www.mindcharity.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/foodmood.pdf","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.mindcharity.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/foodmood.pdf","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":"_blank","linktype":"url"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"British Nutrition Foundation – Healthy Hydration","type":"text"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"https://www.nutrition.org.uk/attachments/article/429/Healthy%20hydration%20for%20adults.pdf","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.nutrition.org.uk/attachments/article/429/Healthy%20hydration%20for%20adults.pdf","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":"_blank","linktype":"url"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Adan, A. 2012. Cognitive Performance and Dehydration. Journal of the American College of Nutrition.","type":"text"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"https://www.researchgate.net/publication/230600141_Cognitive_Performance_and_Dehydration","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.researchgate.net/publication/230600141_Cognitive_Performance_and_Dehydration","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":"_blank","linktype":"url"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Merhej, R. (2019), Dehydration and cognition: an understated relation. International Journal of Health Governance 2019:24(1):19-30. ","type":"text"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"https://www.emerald.com/insight/content/doi/10.1108/IJHG-10-2018-0056/full/pdf?title=dehydration-and-cognition-an-understated-relation","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https://www.emerald.com/insight/content/doi/10.1108/IJHG-10-2018-0056/full/pdf?title=dehydration-and-cognition-an-understated-relation","uuid":null,"anchor":null,"target":"_blank","linktype":"url"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Ganio (2011). Mild dehydration impairs cognitive performance and mood of men. 389414","type":"text"},{"type":"hard_break"},{"text":"1535..1543 (cambridge.org)","type":"text"}]}]},"component":"content-cta-centered"}]}}]},"component":"centered","background_color":"bg-white"},{"_uid":"fbdcf1a1-9384-4107-b6e0-ca6ae58056ef","items":["8eb38a6f-7a5c-43a8-b283-6a736e47e4e9","e9512c4f-078a-4425-a019-dc47dd81ed8c","9bd1cc14-3c8d-4f68-8219-44d5e7ecda04"],"component":"three-column-cards","custom_label":"","custom_title":"","background_color":"bg-white"}],"meta":{"_uid":"c96a5e49-43eb-4cae-921b-021f78eff6bf","title":"ANDYSMANCLUB x Britvic | ANDYSMANCLUB","plugin":"meta-fields","description":"After announcing our partnership earlier this week, we spoke to Jenny Hardwick, a member of Britvic’s Nutrition Team, about the links between hydration, nutrition and positive Mental Health."},"component":"news_views","description":"","featured_image":{"id":4953634,"alt":null,"name":"","focus":null,"title":null,"filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/x/7c183c4c49/amc-x-britvic-1500x1000.svg","copyright":null,"fieldtype":"asset"}}

node.name: Home
node.content: {"_uid":"0dea219c-9aae-4c49-aad6-b0007feccd24","body":[{"_uid":"4dff828f-65c7-497c-b661-a66dabe2035b","title":"It's okay to talk.","component":"hero","hero_image":{"id":11714782,"alt":"","name":"","focus":"","title":"","source":"","filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/1350x1275/75e771494e/hero-image-900x850.jpg","copyright":"","fieldtype":"asset","meta_data":{},"is_external_url":false},"button_text":"Find your nearest group","description":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"ANDYSMANCLUB are a men’s suicide prevention charity, offering free-to-attend peer-to-peer support groups across the United Kingdom and online. We want to end the stigma surrounding men’s mental health and help men through the power of conversation. #ITSOKAYTOTALK","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"button_target":{"id":"","url":"find-your-nearest-group","anchor":"","linktype":"url","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":"find-your-nearest-group"},"background_color":"bg-black"},{"_uid":"40d23509-6fab-4521-b907-229f687c50d7","position":"right","component":"badge","background_color":"bg-black"},{"_uid":"65e248aa-3fce-4762-a134-3234d3add250","label":"Who we are","title":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"WE BREAK DOWN ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"THE STIGMA OF MEN’S ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"MENTAL HEALTH.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"ANDYSMANCLUB has over 120 free support groups nationwide, running every Monday from 7PM except bank holidays. In these groups, men can open up about the storms affecting their lives in a safe, judgement-free and non-clinical environment. Our clubs are designed to be free of pressure, there is no obligation for men to speak, they can simply listen if they wish.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"With over 2800 men using our sessions every week, and an army of 900+ volunteers on board, the movement is continuing to grow week-by-week. We firmly believe in the power of talking and that #ItsOkayToTalk.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Established in 2016 by Elaine, Andy’s Mum, and Luke, Andy’s Brother-in-Law, the aim of the club is to provide men with a safe space where they feel comfortable to talk and open up about their experiences in a room free of judgment.","type":"text"}]}]},"component":"two-column-text","button_text":"MORE ABOUT US","button_target":{"id":"39488ed5-eee3-4521-a5a1-49ba60d35f41","url":"","linktype":"story","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":"who-we-are"},"background_color":"bg-black","white_background":false},{"_uid":"0fe0bfdf-977f-4b92-804c-e2c2b1a91d36","image":{"id":11714894,"alt":"","name":"","focus":"","title":"","source":"","filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/2000x1500/76b2e55798/central-brand-trio-1000x750-tbb.png","copyright":"","fieldtype":"asset","meta_data":{},"is_external_url":false},"label":"","title":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"THE FIRST RULE ABOUT ANDYSMANCLUB IS","type":"text"},{"text":" ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"IT’S OKAY TO TALK","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"italic"}]},{"text":" ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"AT ANDYSMANCLUB.","type":"text"}]}]},"content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Simply put, that’s the whole point. It’s a group where men don’t have to battle to be heard or listened to, but where they can join the fight to reduce the rate of suicide in men.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"simple-center-branded-with-image","button_text":"","button_target":{"id":"","url":"","linktype":"story","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":""},"background_color":"bg-white"},{"_uid":"5c7f33ff-88ba-4f2a-8e7a-f229e34e9c51","image":{"id":4954197,"alt":"","name":"","focus":null,"title":"","filename":"https://a.storyblok.com/f/153326/370x550/206a991cb2/andy-roberts-370x550.png","copyright":"","fieldtype":"asset"},"label":"OUR WHY","title":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"WE HAVE ONE AIM, ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"TO HELP ONE GUY, ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"TO SAVE ONE LIFE.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"content":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"ANDYSMANCLUB takes its name from Andrew Roberts, ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"a man who sadly took his own life aged 23 in early 2016. Andy was a lovely and doting father, son, brother, grandson, nephew, cousin and friend, and was just 23 years old when he was taken away by suicide, sadly and tragically without warning.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"On average one man every two hours takes his life in the UK. It’s often said to be a factor is that men don’t talk. That’s why ANDYSMANCLUB was born. Established in 2016 by Luke Ambler, Andy’s brother-in-law, the aim of the club is to break down these stigmas, support men struggling, and lend a hand to suicide prevention. ","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"That change starts with you...","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]}]}]},"component":"two-column-text-image","button_text":"","button_target":{"id":"","url":"","linktype":"story","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":""},"background_color":"bg-white","black_background":false},{"_uid":"7ba4b4b3-5fed-48bd-8772-ce8783d8f604","items":["a90d4838-a4a8-43b1-b116-6570dee4f52c","81060992-5c2d-493c-ab61-51099242f06d","d6620ff6-fad7-4eab-b5cb-e6cf09b4774f","2491ff4d-9d76-4f56-9eb9-ec56f4fd3c1a","47d92cc1-1121-4e80-acbc-18bf5a058c0e","ad622251-7e87-46f5-a7d3-a1d45a74ccd6","479639d6-9eec-4f98-a00b-7c51725e4be8","6619150e-ffc6-49fc-b82c-df7f1c38e011"],"label":"","title":"OUR GROUPS","component":"groups","button_text":"SEE ALL OUR GROUPS","button_target":{"id":"","url":"find-your-nearest-group","anchor":"","linktype":"url","fieldtype":"multilink","cached_url":"find-your-nearest-group"},"background_color":"bg-black"},{"_uid":"a974641c-cd53-41c5-a40b-00e22fbbf11e","items":["4bb2a7ea-f9e2-4439-80b7-1b729ba3589f","64f30a81-642a-4e4d-b757-ddd6462f4cd3","6bd1e6d7-76f2-4393-864c-fafb45539175","d4913e0d-737d-43fd-8c15-dc2a2a9b5ed1","a22ce652-893b-43bb-a2a2-441deef31236","b8a5c024-4713-42b9-ba62-d5a5ab1b02c4","3b376000-b121-4627-bdc0-9f0f97daf1fc","409a1ea4-bc49-43f0-a7a9-c9864f76b8cd"],"label":"REAL PEOPLE, REAL STORIES","component":"testimonials","button_text":"See another Men Attending.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"type":"hard_break","marks":[{"type":"styled","attrs":{"class":""}}]},{"text":"115+
